issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Scanner::TakeRows should push down the query if possible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12369](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12369). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11797 introduces Scanner::TakeRows but this doesn't push down the query; it could perhaps be made to do so.
